description: After an easy dessert? Try these rustic baked apple slices sprinkled with cinnamon and topped with a dollop of yoghurt, perfect for a cosy night in.
keywords: Cooked fruit,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Sep 2021,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Baked Cinnamon Apples Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tsp ground cinnamon (plus extra to serve)
6 Macro Organic Royal Gala apples, peeled, cored, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sugar and spices in a small bowl. Place apple in a large baking dish. Add lemon juice, 2 tbs water and sugar mixture. Toss to combine. Cover tightly with foil. Bake for 20 minutes or until apple is just tender. Uncover, stir and bake for a further 5 minutes or until apple is tender and syrup has thickened slightly.
Divide apple mixture among bowls. Dollop with yoghurt and serve sprinkled with extra cinnamon.
